resources.name: all-subscribed-skus
resources.title: All subscribed SKUs
resources.description: List all Microsoft 365/Azure AD subscribed SKUs (licenses) available to your tenant.

resources.name: all-users-with-assigned-licenses
resources.title: All users with assigned licenses
resources.description: List all users, including their assigned licenses, display name, and principal name.

resources.name: users-with-any-assigned-license
resources.title: Users with any assigned license
resources.description: Get users who have at least one license assigned, including their license and profile details.

resources.name: unlicensed-users
resources.title: Unlicensed users
resources.description: List all users who currently have no licenses assigned.

resources.name: microsoft-365-groups-with-licenses
resources.title: Microsoft 365 groups with licenses
resources.description: List all Microsoft 365 (Unified) Groups that have licenses assigned.
